thread.section_title: Living: Weddings, Interior Design, Food, Travel, and Parties - Vogue
thread.title: Food Porn: Afternoon Tea

author: Laird Borrelli-Persson
title: Food Porn: Afternoon Tea
text: The jam-packed London Fashion Week schedule leaves editors little time to indulge in the luscious afternoon teas that the British have made an institution. Which really is a shame because the whistle of the kettle is an invitation to sip and nibble—on scones and clotted cream, crustless cress sandwiches, and tartlets—preferably served on fine china and enjoyed with good friends in, as P. G. Wodehouse wrote in The Code of the Woosters , an “atmosphere of leisured cosiness.”
